price: (2) And if they see a sign [i.e., miracle], they turn away and say, "Passing magic."[1578]
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
